original_text: And it came to pass in the morning that his spirit was troubled; and he sent and called for all the magicians of Egypt, and all the wise men thereof: and Pharaoh told them his dream; but there was none that could interpret them unto Pharaoh.
korean_text: 아침에 그의 마음이 번민하여 사람을 보내어 애굽의 점술가와 현인들을 모두 불러 그들에게 그의 꿈을 말하였으나 그것을 바로에게 해석하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in the morning
and he sent and called for all the magicians of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 이집트의 모든 마술사들을 보내 부르렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and all the wise men thereof
and Pharaoh told them his dream
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바로가 그들에게 자신의 꿈을 이야기했습니다

sentences.original_text: but there was none that could interpret them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것들을 해석할 수 있는 사람이 없었습니다
